incident_updates.body: Start time : 14/09/2023 08:00 UTC End time : 14/09/2023 10:00 UTC Service impact : None Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy of our network infrastructure, we will be doing to replace a defective network equipment.

Start time : 18/09/2023 04:00 UTC End time : 21/09/2023 07:00 UTC Service impact : Customers might experience twice of a few seconds of input/output freeze for storage equipment during the maintenance. Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy of our network infrastructure, we will be doing an internal maintenance on a network equipment.

incident_updates.body: Maintenance will begin as scheduled in 60 minutes.

Start time : 12/06/2023 06:00 UTC End time : 31/08/2023 16:00 UTC Service impact : During NSX upgrade , Hosts will be put in maintenance mode and reboot During vSphere and Zerto migrations , management will be inaccessible for 3 hours. During ESXi migrations , In some case Binaries will be pushed locally or Hosts will be rebooted, (no impact as the hosts are in maintenance mode). Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy of our infrastructure, we are rolling an upgrade for the VMware vCenter Server Appliance solution and ESXi for customers with and without Zerto service
